title: The Presence of God Week 3 with Whitney Capps
description:
For the third week of The Presence of God series, Raechel and Amanda talk with Bible teacher, author, and Simple Seminary founder, Whitney Capps. As they venture through the week's reading together, the three friends marvel at the reality of God's presence, wrestle with some hard truths, and rejoice in the lightbulb moments that make Bible reading a constant adventure. Amid chats about the temple curtain and the importance of obedience over sacrifice, they remind one another that all of Scripture, even the parts that are tough to read or imagine, are written by God for His glory and our good.

Read with Us: This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth The Presence of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop The Presence of God collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-presence-of-god-week-3-with-whitney-capps/
